chapters.title: Chapter 23:  Ornaments
chapters.info: Corele Hovian, p. 534 (644)—Boyishly slim yet pretty Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She has thick black eyebrows and raven-black hair. She always dresses as if she is going to a country dance. She is now one of Cadsuane's companions. She has bonded Damer Flinn as her Warder.
